short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control your openHAB instance from a popup!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
openHAB Controller is a simple extension that allows you to control your openHAB (https://www.openhab.org/) system easily from a little window pop-up on Google Chrome.

It's based on hazymat's extension, Mini OpenHAB Controller. Some modification was done to allow HTTPS and openHAB Cloud instances (e.g. https://myopenhab.org) to be used.

If you have any question, please feel free to contact me.

The extension is opensource and the code can be found at https://github.com/lucianopeixoto/openhab-chrome
